TopicTitle: About a planet mod and Kerbalism

Articles.Content:
1.) On Kerbalism, is there a way to widen the GUI?

2.) I have been looking at planet mods and I cant seem to find one. All of them revamp the current system into the real one. Im looking for planet mods that adds new planets and moons that doesn't change the existing ones. Is there a mod like that?

 

Thanks.

1. I don't use Kerbalism,but i think it is impossible.

2. There is OPM mod it adds 3 gas giants and 1 dwarf planet. Only thing it changes is Eeloo's orbit.

And there is Kargantua. It is a planet mod that adds a blackhole with someplanets, far away from Kerbol.

1. Do not use but maybe the ui scalling will help you there?

2. Look in Kopernicus Tread. Maybe OPM (Outer Planets mod) will help you?

On other hand we have a full new starsystem mods like GPP (Galileos Planet Pack)

Or look here

You see which one are actual and sorted by funktion like adding new Planets 

Funny Kabooms 

Urses 

E:  look by planet packs
